title: New: Grapell – Shaping My Love
content:
Photo: Adina Triumf

Well over a year since Stockholm duo Grapell cropped up with their intriguing debut EP, and they’re now back with a far more coherent and focused sound. Shaping My Love ditches the Radiohead fascination that clung to their first release, and finds them sliding through a range of soul and R&B influences. Yet again marking them out as one of the most exciting Swedish acts around at this moment in time, it’ll be interesting to see where their forthcoming EP takes them.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
